Educating Students Today
for Success Tomorrow
Moment by moment, day by day, Mannford Public Schools is making choices and making weather which affords our students the opportunity to be raised up to be men and women of character, diligence, and excellence--citizens in the finest sense of the word.
Thank you, Mannford!

Grade Book Access
Dear Parents,
We welcome you and your child to Mannford School. We value our partnership with you and work to ensure that you have all of the tools necessary to support your child. One of those tools is our grade book program; this program allows you and your child easy access to information about assignments, grades, attendance, and more. This year, the company that supplies our grade book system has enacted some changes that require parents and students to request login information before allowing access to the grade book. Please follow the instructions below to be granted access:
Parents should send an email request for grade book access tomannfordgrades@mannford.k12.ok.us. Please send this request using the email address that you have on file with the school so that we can be sure we only send this information to verified parents/guardians. It may take twenty-four hours before you receive a return email with the login information to the parentportal.
Students must also request login information to gain access to the student grade book portal. All students--grades four and up--have been issued a school email address. Students should send a request tomannfordgrades@mannford.k12.ok.usfrom their school email address; in return, they will receive login information.
Thank you for your understanding as we convert to this new process. We look forward to working with you this year!
Follow us on Twitter and Facebook.
Mannford Public Schools

Disclaimer: This site is for informational and educational purposes only. Every attempt is taken to present accurate and up-to-date information. We cannot, however, guarantee that inaccuracies will not occur. The Mannford Public School District will not be held responsible for any damage or inconvenience caused as a result of any error or information within these pages. For our patrons convenience, some pages contain links to outside sites. The Mannford Public School District does not assume responsibility for the content of these linked sites
